mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, email, password, gender, birth, address, member, phone_number) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{member}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, address = #{address}, member = #{member}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} WHERE id = #{id};
